description: A colorful and ridiculous wig fit for a clown.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A red latex nose often seen being worn by clowns.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A delicate golden crown featuring flowering trees.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A golden crown for the monarch of survivors.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A protective piece of equipment commonly used by athletes, which is worn inside the mouth to protect your teeth.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A skinny black and white checkered necktie.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A simple black bow tie.  Best worn with a suit.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A clip-on necktie, with blue and silver stripes.  It's quick and easy to put on, and much better than the necktie.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

An ordinary, green necktie.  It's more difficult to put on, but it takes real skill to do so.  Wearing a necktie is much better than wearing a clip-on tie.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
